Work History

As a lifelong learner, I’m a proudly self-taught designer with roots in visual design, and a background in neuropsychology & computer science. Looking to combine and expand on my interests, I found my merry way to product and UX design — I haven’t looked back since.

Currently, I’m leading cross-functional UX alignment at Unity, focusing on deepening and broadening my UX, technical, and leadership skillsets.

2020 — Now
  • Senior Product Designer @ Unity
  • Lead framework initiative for aligning UX inconsistency across Unity’s flagship product, the Unity Editor, working with a community of 30+ designers and 10+ development teams to serve 1.5 million users.

  • Managing & executing framework requests and process: something about working with volunteer teams.

  • something about alignment and scope with PMs and development teams

  • Lead user research efforts for the Design System.
2018 — 2020
  • Product & Visual Designer @ Element AI
  • Visual UI & UX design for AI Toolkit, Data Labeller, and Task Orchestrator products.
  • Web design for corporate website.
  • Visual storytelling and communication in marketing & sales collateral.
  • Visual design team resource & workflow management.
2017 — 2018
  • Visual Designer @ Students’ Society of McGill University
  • Web design, branding, social media, and print graphics.
2013 — 2018
  • Visual Designer – Freelance
  • Rebranding & web projects for clients and student-run organizations.
  • Production of social media, print graphics, video graphics.
2013 — 2017
  • Cognitive Science Bachelor's Student @ McGill University
  • Interdisciplinary Arts & Science program with focus in neuropsychology & computer science.
